articles.author: Seb Starcevic
articles.title: Europe is at hybrid war, Danish prime minister announces - politico.eu
articles.description: There is one obvious antagonist “and that is Russia,” Mette Frederiksen says.
articles.content:
Frederiksen said Danish authorities had yet to identify "who is behind the hybrid attacks against our airports and other critical infrastructure" but hinted the Kremlin was responsible.
"We can at l… [+862 chars]
